summary: A grand musical about three passionate and dreamy characters: Rahul, Pooja and Nisha. Will their dreams come true? Will they find their true love?
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Madhuri Dixit|Karisma Kapoor|Akshay Kumar|Farida Jalal|Deven Verma|Aruna Irani|Murad Ali|Hemlata Deepak|Suresh Menon|Tanya Mukherjee|Balvinder Singh Suri|Rajesh Tandon|Shruti Ultaf|Priya Varma|Shivani Vazir|Pamela Chopra|Yash Chopra|Shahid Kapoor|Sanjeev Kohli
title: Dil To Pagal Hai
